content: informations diffèrent pour les tailles les instructions sont d abord données pour la taille 1 puis pour les us 2-4 6-8 10-12 14-16 tailles 2 à 4 entre crochets séparées par des points-virgule exemple taille 1 taille 2 taille 3 taille 4 pensez à surligner votre taille avant de eu 34-36 38-40 42-44 46-48 tricoter maße in der anleitung findest du angaben für it 38-40 42-44 46-48 50-52 4 größen dort wo sich die angaben voneinander unterscheiden findest du zuerst die anleitung für größe 1 und dahinter die für größe 2-4 in klammern welche wiederum aus 6-8 10-12 14-16 18-20 mit doppelpunkten voneinander getrennt sind beispiel größe 1 größe 2 größe 3 größe 4 asia 7-9 11-13 15-17 19-21 tip markiere dir die angaben für deine größe mit einem textmarker um dich besser zurecht zu finden 6 #woolandthegang 1 2 3 4 size / taille / größe to fit chest 81-86 91-97 102-107 112-117 tour de poitrine 32-34 36-38 40-42 44-46 brust weite uk 6-8 10-12 14-16 18-20 us 2-4 6-8 10-12 14-16 eu 34-36 38-40 42-44 46-48 it 38-40 42-44 46-48 50-52 aus 6-8 10-12 14-16 18-20 asia 7-9 11-13 15-17 19-21 getting started 7 1 + 2 10cm/3 9 10 75cm/4 2 43cm/16 9 43cm/16 9 9 25cm/3 6 10cm/3 9 3 + 4 11 5cm/4 5 12cm/4 7 43cm/16 9 43cm/16 9 10 75cm/4 2 11 25cm/4 4 8 #woolandthegang eng wilkinson leg warmers let s begin how to make your wilkinson leg warmers 9 let s get making tool kit gauge 3 balls of watg s feeling good yarn to ensure your knitting has the same 1 wilkinson leg warmers pattern measurements as the pattern it is a good 1 pair of 3 5mm us4 knitting needles idea to make a gauge swatch before you 1 sewing needle start knitting your project a gauge swatch is a small sample of your knitting where you count the stitches and row and check them against the measurements cm/in given in the pattern if you get more stitches/ row than the pattern s gauge it means your knitting is tighter if you get fewer stitches/row than the pattern your knitting is looser sometimes it works to knit tighter or looser to compensate 2x2 rib stitch 10 cm/4 = 30 stitches 10 cm/4 = 32 row 1x1 rib stitch 10 cm/4 = 28 stitches 10 cm/4 = 30 row you can find all techniques on page 13 pssst remember that you must not copy our patterns and sell or even give them away for free in accordance with copyright law 10 #woolandthegang eng how to make your wilkinson leg warmers your leg warmers are knitted flat from the bottom up and then sewn together follow the instructions twice to make your left and right leg warmers 1 cast on 58 62 66 70 stitches using the long-tail cast on technique 2 starting with a wrong side row and 2 purl stitches work in 2x2 rib stitch until your piece measures
